<p style="text-align: center;">
  Please join us in congratulating Alejandro Jaume Losa on his latest article, published in the May 2025 volume of *Studies in Hispanic and Lusophone Linguistics (SHiLL)*. His article explores the relationship between political orientation and attitudes towards Catalan and Spanish in Mallorca, utilizing scalar survey data.
  
  <br>
  <strong><span>
   Jaume-Losa, A. A. (2025). “From left to right”: the influence of political orientation on the language                attitudes of the population of Palma toward Catalan and Spanish. *Studies in Hispanic and Lusophone             Linguistics, 18*(1), 131-166.
  </span></strong></em> 
  
  <br>
  Read the article <a href="https://www.degruyterbrill.com/document/">here!</a>
</p>
